body.p: The Application Layout preferences allow you to customize the arrangement and behavior of the application's user interface. The following options are available:

dlentry.dd:
Choose how the application's layout is determined:
Default: Uses the standard layout provided by the application.
Predefined: Allows selection of a predefined layout (option is disabled in the current view).
Custom: Lets you specify a custom layout file.
If selected, the application layout will be reset to the chosen configuration each time the application starts.

dlentry.dt: Remember layout changes for each project
dlentry.dd: If enabled, the application will remember and restore layout changes individually for each project.

dlentry.dt: Allow detaching of editors from main window
dlentry.dd: When checked, editors can be detached from the main application window and moved independently.

Specifies the position of view tabs within the interface:
Top: Places view tabs at the top of the view area.
Bottom: Places view tabs at the bottom of the view area.

Specifies the position of editor tabs:
Top: Places editor tabs at the top of the editor area.
Bottom: Places editor tabs at the bottom of the editor area.

body.p: Note: To apply these changes, you must restart the application.
